title: Bacon and potato tart
ingredients: ['1 packet puff pastry', '2 large King Edward potatoes, sliced very thinly', 'sea salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '10 rashers streaky bacon or pancetta, chopped', '150g Gruyere, Emmental or Cheddar cheese, grated', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh rosemary', '1 egg, beaten']
